title: Fedhas' Mad Dash
data:
'''Fedhas' Mad Dash''' is one of the original four [[Dungeon Sprint]] modules. See the [[Sprint guide]] for further advice. ==Layout== 

NAME:   dungeon_sprint_fedhas
TAGS:   sprint no_item_gen no_trap_gen no_monster_gen no_pool_fixup no_rotate no_hmirror no_vmirror
